item.title: Accor has launched the Novotel Kolkata Hotel & Residences
item.description:
Novotel Kolkata Hotel & Residences, the largest five-star hotel in Kolkata, is now open in the city’s New Town precinct. Source: Accor Hotels. The Novotel Kolkata Hotel & Residences. The hotel has 347 guest rooms and suites. It is located near the airport and offers the city’s first serviced apartments. Guests can enjoy amenities such as a flat-screen LED TV, coffee and tea maker, in-room safe, refreshment center, and complimentary internet access...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accor-has-launched-the-novotel-kolkata-hotel-residences/
